requirement.en: When your monster is destroyed by an opponent's attack, shuffle 2 Level 5 or higher monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Destroy 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field. Then, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 1000 ATK until the end of your next turn.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
